statements: SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_items->'product_name' AS product_name FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, count(order_id) as total_orders FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING count(order_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(order_items) as num_items, customer_name FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY num_items DESC
SELECT customer_name, SUM(JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(order_items)) as total_items FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_items DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customer_orders
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT order_date, customer_id FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 50 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 123
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders INNER JOIN delivery_routes ON customer_orders.order_id = delivery_routes.route_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM customer_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders;
SELECT pickup_location, delivery_location, distance, route_id, driver_id FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM customer_orders;
SELECT driver_id, route_id, pickup_location, delivery_location, distance FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, driver_id, pickup_location, delivery_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance < 10 ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND payment_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_amount, payment_transactions.transaction_date FROM orders JOIN payment_transactions ON orders.order_id = payment_transactions.order_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_type FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT route_description, start_location, end_location FROM DeliveryRoutes;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, vehicle_type FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT tc.transaction_date, co.total_amount FROM PaymentTransactions tc INNER JOIN CustomerOrders co ON tc.order_id = co.order_id WHERE tc.transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT dr.route_description, dr.start_location, dr.end_location FROM DeliveryRoutes dr WHERE dr.driver_id = 2;
